description: Charles the Victorious, with the help of Joan of Arc, was able to turn the tide of the decades-long war. 22 years after Joan tragically burned at the stake, he finally succeeded in driving the English out of France. Sudden attacks by his knights are his specialty.
taunt_1: Aren't you tired of losing battle after battle? That seems like a thankless task.
taunt_2: It's quite simple, there can only be one victor. Let's make sure it's me.
taunt_3: Your presence is hard to tolerate, good that you won't be here much longer.
anger_1: It is not your destiny to rule this land.
nervous_1: I know your kind; you won't last long.
nervous_2: The sky looks dark, do what you can.
victory_1: Ha ha, my men saved the day.
victory_2: Hmmm, I hope you weren't attached to those buildings.
victory_3: Oh dear, it seems you were hacked to pieces... what a shame.
victory_4: Come, don't be upset. You simply lack leadership skills, that's all.
request: Before you begin your attack, why don't you send me some goods to look after... In case something bad happens.
thanks: Thank you for the goods, my esteemed ally.
ally_death: Merde, the throne should have been mine, I say, MINE!
congrats: Good move, knight, you surprise me.
boast: Must I take full responsibility for the war? Try an attack.
extra: You should slow down, it is seven o'clock.
siege: Another siege is upon us, my friend. My men are in high spirits.
no_attack_1: Mon Dieu, I can only fight one battle at a time.
no_attack_2: It's time you took on a little more responsibility here.
no_help_1: I won't get involved in one of your fights again!
no_help_2: My best wishes, brave knight, but I cannot help.
no_sent: Wait, I have a better idea. Why don't I stockpile supplies?
sent: I've sent you the goods, please don't waste them.
team_winning: Our game is inevitably nearing its end... He He He, our enemies tremble.
team_losing: Fight harder, knight, we are losing control of this kingdom!
help_sent: Don't panic, reinforcements are on the way.
will_attack: At last! I've been waiting for months to launch our attack.
